opportunities.description: Investing in or partnering on development of effective software frameworks for early deep learning approaches using structural design
Collaborative research project opportunities involving University of Toronto, NYU, Stanford to explore new deep learning directions
Hiring skilled experts or researchers to work on creating and implementing new deep learning software frameworks

action_items: Reach out to Jeff Gitton for potential research and technology partnership
Initiate contact with University of Toronto to propose joint research initiatives on deep learning software frameworks
Engage NYU and Stanford for collaborative opportunities in AI research and software innovation
Evaluate internal capability and potential hiring needs to support deep learning software development
